subject: Attention:Tara, Here is the copy of my identification
body:
Attention:Tara

I acknowledge receipt of your mail and content noted with thanks. It may
interest you to know that we are not surprised that you have not received
your payment. I want you to know that we represent the United Nations and
we are assisting in making sure contracts and inheritance due payment are
made and released.

You should have faith and believe that your payment is sure this time
around and all we require from you is total compliance. Have it in mind
that this is real and we need to hear from you to know how best to assist
you get your fund paid to you.

I want to reveal REALITY to you about how this investigation has been all
along. We confirmed that the paying bank that was supposed to release your
funds to you has been illegally using your  funds for TERM DEPOSITS, and am
very certain that you are not aware of  this. Well you are supposed to
receive the sum of $8.5million which is your fund.

Enough is enough on this sort of ugly approach towards your funds release
and transfer. If you can listen and take instructions from
this noble office  your transfer will be done at the shortest possible time.

Do get back to us with the following information as stated below:

Your Full Names:
Your Cell/ mobile phone number:
Your Copy of your identification
Your Contact Address:

Beware about all this and I advise you to stop all communication with
anyone or group of person(s) regarding this transaction.

I will advise you further on the way forward as soon as you send the above
information. Attached is my work ID for your reference.
Regards,

Mr Philip Brown
Funds Investigator

subject: Re: Attention:Tara, Here is the copy of my identification
body:
Dear Mr. Philip Brown,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am relieved to hear that the United Nations is involved in ensuring due payments are made and released.

However, I am quite shocked to learn about the illegal use of my funds for term deposits by the supposed paying bank. This is indeed news to me and I appreciate your transparency in this matter.

As requested, here are my details:

Mobile Phone Number: 


I look forward to your advice on the way forward and hope for a swift resolution to this matter.

Best wishes,
Tara

subject: Attention:Tara, Here is the copy of my identification
body:
